languages.text: "Есть какая-то ирония в том, что нормальной меня считает только полный псих".
"There's irony in a complete lunatic being the only one who thinks me normal."
languages.original_text: "Есть какая-то ирония в том, что нормальной меня считает только полный псих".

traits.locale_text: "There's irony in a complete lunatic being the only one who thinks me normal."
"There's irony in a complete lunatic being the only one who thinks me normal."
"There's irony in a complete lunatic being the only one who thinks me normal."
"There's irony in a complete lunatic being the only one who thinks me normal."
"There's irony in a complete lunatic being the only one who thinks me normal."
"There's irony in a complete lunatic being the only one who thinks me normal."

languages.text: «Es irónico que un lunático sin remedio sea el único que me considera normal».
languages.original_text: "There's irony in a complete lunatic being the only one who thinks me normal."

traits.locale_text: «Es irónico que un lunático sin remedio sea el único que me considera normal».

languages.text: “这个彻头彻尾的疯子是唯一一个觉得我完全正常的人，这可真是太讽刺了。”
languages.original_text: "There's irony in a complete lunatic being the only one who thinks me normal."

traits.locale_text: “这个彻头彻尾的疯子是唯一一个觉得我完全正常的人，这可真是太讽刺了。”

languages.text: 「あたいのことを普通だと考えてくれるのが完全におかしな奴だなんて、なんて皮肉なことだろう」
languages.original_text: "There's irony in a complete lunatic being the only one who thinks me normal."

traits.locale_text: 「あたいのことを普通だと考えてくれるのが完全におかしな奴だなんて、なんて皮肉なことだろう」

languages.text: « Il est amusant de constater que le seul individu qui me considère comme normale est un malade mental. »
languages.original_text: "There's irony in a complete lunatic being the only one who thinks me normal."

traits.locale_text: « Il est amusant de constater que le seul individu qui me considère comme normale est un malade mental. »

languages.text: "Gerçek bir kaçığın beni normal bulan tek kişi olması ne ironik."
languages.original_text: "There's irony in a complete lunatic being the only one who thinks me normal."

traits.locale_text: "Gerçek bir kaçığın beni normal bulan tek kişi olması ne ironik."

languages.text: "Es entbehrt nicht einer gewissen Ironie, dass sich ein Verrückter für den einzig Normalen hält."
languages.original_text: "There's irony in a complete lunatic being the only one who thinks me normal."

traits.locale_text: "Es entbehrt nicht einer gewissen Ironie, dass sich ein Verrückter für den einzig Normalen hält."
